CueroPapel&Tijera

Freelance - Dec 2017-Sep 2018

CueroPapel&Tijera is a Costa Rican brand dedicated to the design and development of products made out of leather. For almost a year I worked along side the Art Direction department designing their web-based brand and producing all of their digital content.

SKILLS

Art-Direction, Photography, Videography


Tools

Adobe CC, DSLR


Team Members

Rocio Chacon

Who We Are


Our main goal with the video series was to create a brand concept and identity, so that people associate Costa Rica and all of its treasures with CueroPapel&Tijera. Combining video and photographs, we created a small video highlighting the values of the brand.

With Love


A video created for the Christmas season. It focuses on all those beautiful details that the store and coffee shop have for the customer.

10 Year Anniversary


As part of the campaign for the celebration of their 10 Year Anniversary, we created a series of three videos highligting the history and trajectory of the brand. Trying to unify all of the branches of CueroPapel&Tijera, this video focuses on the process of design, manufacturing and the end product.

Multimedia Aproach


The whole project was completly focused on every digital space the company has. It was part of our job to design the visual layout of the content for every social media account, their website and their online store. Since we were creating video, photography, gifs and illustrations; we needed to understand each medium we were using to communicate the idea in the most succesful way.

Products


One of our main tasks was working with their products. Photographing them, promoting them and giving them the exposure they deserved

Style


It was imperative to reflect the style of the brand through our photography and art direction

Coffee & Restaurant


Besides the main store and products, we also had to create the visual unity and digital content for their coffee and restaurant
